short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replay keyboard shortcuts and moveplanner enhancements for Advance Wars By Web.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A fork by ForgotToShoot of kbuzsaki's AWBW Enhancements. 

This extension provides additional functionality to Advance Wars by Web, mainly targeting the site's lack-luster move planner. 

My fork is planning to build the tools necessary to create an analysis engine for the game.
